Status

Display simulation status, connection and error information of Vires VTD. Connection Command allows to control connection to Vires VTD simulation on deployed system.

simTime

Vires VTD Simulation Time

simFrame

Vires VTD Simulation Step

Connection Status

Provides information about state of Vires VTD communication link (0: Disconnected, 1: Connected)

Connection Command

Vires VTD connection control command (0: Disconnect, 1: Connect)

LastError

Code of the last error
